short_summary: Electrical contractor for Institut Maurice-Lamontagne, Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on April 06 2023 (06, 04, 2023). All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.,PWGSC, on behalf of FISHERIES AND OCEANS CANADA...
full_summary:
====================================

**EE517-231664 Standing Offer for Electrical Services at Institut Maurice-Lamontagne, Mont-Joli**

### Notice Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS) invites you to submit a bid for the selection of a standing offer for electrical services at the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne in Mont-Joli, Quebec.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3883524656-Doc3883611294
* **Publications Date:** February 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** April 6, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Region of Delivery:** Mont-Joli, Quebec
* **Contracting Entity:** DPWGS, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada

### Tender Requirements

A Request for Standing Offer (RSO) is issued for the electrical services at Institut Maurice-Lamontagne. The successful contractor will provide electrical services as detailed in Annex A. The RSO specification will be governed by the terms and conditions outlined in the attached tender documents.

### Eligibility and Exclusion Criteria

The selective tendering method applies for this RSO. The selection criteria are lowest price.

### Format Requirements

Potential bidders must submit a complete bid, including all necessary documentation, by the stated tender closing date and time. Incomplete bids will be rendered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For additional information and tender opportunities, please contact:
Julien Ratte, SPAC/PDSPC
Phone: Not Available
Email: [julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julien.ratte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Documentation

A Request for Standing Offer (RSO), Annex A, and other supporting documentation are available for download at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15498523?extsite=MTU0OTg1MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15498523?extsite=MTU0OTg1MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Bid Evaluation

The DPWGS has a pre-identified list of potential contractors for this RSO. Consortia bids will not be accepted. The government will evaluate bid submissions and select the bidder offering the lowest price that
